channel.title: Yorgos Lanthimos on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Yorgos Lanthimos on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Emma Stone Gushes About Carl Sagan and Declares: “I Believe in Aliens”
item.description: The two-time Oscar winner joined frequent collaborator and close friend Yorgos Lanthimos and their team from Focus Features for a Thursday press conference, their first Venice Film Festival event.

item.title: Emma Stone Gushes About Carl Sagan and Declares: “I Believe in Aliens”
item.description: The two-time Oscar winner joined frequent collaborator and close friend Yorgos Lanthimos and their team from Focus Features for a Thursday press conference, their first Venice Film Festival event.

item.title: Disability Advocate, AGC Studios Boss, ‘Poor Things’ Producer, Berlinale Boss Set for Locarno Pro
item.description: The industry strand at the Swiss film festival will also feature “The Producer-Director Relationship,” a conversation between Ed Guiney and Romanian auteur Radu Jude.
